circles was that Google's brilliant founders Page and Sergey Brin needed a business-savvy executive to help bring the company to the next level. But as Eric Schmidt put it in a Twitter posting on Thursday( Jan. 20), day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Instead, Eric Schmidt will take on the role of Google's executive chairman, where he says he will focus on broader business partnerships, technology leadership, product development and government outreach. Google Inc. said the management change was made as part of a plan to`` streamline'' decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top. It's a good move. It( the triumvirate management structure) was always one of things that concerned us a little bit, said Ryan Jacob, portfolio manager with the Jacob Internet Fund.`` It should streamline the decision-making process.
